name: Habitat For Horror
description:
It's another 48-hour contest entry!  The theme for this one was Light & Darkness, which will be very apparent to players.  There's a real strange indirect mechanism for playing this game which adds nothing to the gameplay, but one of the themes that didn't quite win was 'Remote Control', so I threw it in anyway.  It's still kind of fun, and contains some pretty puzzling challenges!

* 18 increasingly puzzling levels

* Fusebox madness

* The most interesting song you will hear this week.  C, H, U, D!

* A button to switch that music off
